title: Mom, why won't you listen?
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Adolescent psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Role playing
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Interpersonal communication
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal relations in adolescence
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenagers - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal communication
description: An open-ended film which provides role-playing situations designed to help teenagers in getting their parents to listen and respond to them. Is it a matter of picking the right moment and approach, or is it something deeper? What can each son or daughter do about it?
